meanings.definition: A musical group made up of members from other well-known bands.
meanings.sent1: The supergroups performed a concert together, showcasing their combined talent.
meanings.sent2: Fans were excited to see the supergroups collaborate on a new album.
meanings.sent3: The supergroups decided to start a band after realizing they all played different instruments.
meanings.sent4: The supergroups' music was like a delicious blend of various flavors, creating a unique sound.
meanings.sent5: The supergroups' performance was a mesmerizing display of musical prowess.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things with exceptional talent or ability.
meanings.sent1: The team of scientists was a supergroups in the field of research.
meanings.sent2: The supergroups of artists collaborated on a stunning masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The supergroups of chefs created a culinary masterpiece that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, the supergroups of athletes set new records effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The supergroups of students excelled in every subject, making their teachers proud.
